Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is slightly grooved and spotted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394206) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394206)
